extendedInfo.description: Watch as a marijuana plant slowly grows in the background on your phone screen.You can choose how long it takes for the plant to grow from seedling to full-grown flowering.Whether you call it weed, pot, grass, herb, bud, ganja, marijuana, cannabis, this plant has been an important part of human society for thousands of years.Compatible with Android 2.1+To use, download the app and change your Wallpaper. Then choose the live wallpaper "Watch Grass Grow."Please let me know if you have any problems! Ratings and reviews very appreciated!

reviews.comment: Really sucks it slows my pone down can\'t beleave I paid for it but thought it was cool if that wasn\'t the case
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wish it actually allowed you to watch instead of just switching between certain pictures of different parts in the growth cycle. Boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Stylistic and changes slow enough that it doesn\'t get old too quickly. Very cool app! Doesn\'t drain battery like so many other live wallpapers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool I guess. But completely screwed up my phone. Took over an hour to get it off my background because my phone basically shutdown on me. Good after
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Update with more strains pls. Purple strain, Plushberry, etc. Overall awesome app to start. Looking forward to updates
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says. Being able to adjust the growth time was a nice touch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This really slowed my phone down so I installed in less than a day. Much better improvement now with phone speed. HTC Inspire/Desire HD
reviews.author: A Google User
